attributes.action: Reinburse University Students for Strike Action
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to step in and either a) reinburse students themeselves or b) force Universities to reinburse students. Through continuos strike action, after a period of disruption due to Covid 19, University Students education is being constantly impacted and disrupted, with students quality of education being impacted upon. The strikes and marking boycotts means students are not recieving what they payed for and should be reinbursed to reflect this.
attributes.background: We call for government and parliament to debate reinbursing University students for their tution fees. Strike Action has lost these students education and they have been paying for a service they are not recieving, thus deserve some compensation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/628976
